With Coin Dog you always have the current crypto price while you browse the web. 

Forget about opening new tabs and navigating to other websites for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero and other cryptocurrencies prices.

Search for specific coins or tokens, add them to your favorites and quick check the prices you need. Coin Dog also offers you quick rate conversion for any token so you can expend less time with calculations.

If you need more than just the current price, we can also help you with our historic graphics. Candle and line charts are available in the expanded view up to one year. Need just a quick trending view? No problem, check up to 30 days trend line right on the extension window.
